Portal 2. Wow. This game blew me away the first time I played it. No doubt is this one of the best games ever made, bar none. It takes the great portal concept from the first game and runs a marathon with it. The dialogue, voice acting and overall presentation of the characters  in Portal 2 is top notch. Hilarious wit, insults and banter combined with interesting and fresh puzzles makes for a truly marvellous experience that you'll struggle to forget. This game gets everything right in my opinion. The story is gripping and clever, the new additions are all unique and the overall presentation (new animations etc) is stunning. Stephen Merchant lends his voice in this game too so how could you possibly resist that? Overall I'd call this game a masterpiece and an absolute must play (it runs only basically anything too so you've got no excuse).
